author: Chris Frankel
description: A voluptuously flavoured nightcap that tastes boozier than it actually is. However, the residents of Nassau Street party hard.
name: Nassau Street
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth
30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
